com.atakmap.android.widgets

Class LinearLayoutWidget

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • com.atakmap.android.widgets.MapWidget
        • com.atakmap.android.widgets.MapWidget2
          • com.atakmap.android.widgets.AbstractParentWidget
            • com.atakmap.android.widgets.LayoutWidget
              • com.atakmap.android.widgets.LinearLayoutWidget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapWidget.OnVisibleChangedListener, MapWidget2.OnWidgetSizeChangedListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RelockWidget, ScrollLayoutWidget
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class LinearLayoutWidget
extends LayoutWidget
implements MapWidget.OnVisibleChangedListener, MapWidget2.OnWidgetSizeChangedListener
    Parent widget with functions similar to a LinearLayout view

        Deprecated. 
        Get or create a new layout widget in this hierarchy
        Parameters:
